SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, PO_STATUS, CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN '미결' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'I' THEN '진행중' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '마감' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'C' THEN '검수마감' ELSE '미정' END AS PO_TEXT, COUNT(PO_STATUS) AS STACK_CHART_VALUE FROM PO_DETAIL WHERE CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CREATE_DATE, PO_STATUS ORDER BY ORDER_DATE ASC, CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'I' THEN 2 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 3 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'C' THEN 4 ELSE 5 END
